channel.title: Monitoring Minutes
channel.description: A daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy and macroeconomic developments. This AI-generated podcast transforms economic data into accessible insights, covering Banco de Mexico policy decisions, inflation trends, employment figures, and market expectations. Part of the Monitoring Monetary Policy in Mexico project, which demonstrates how automation and large language models can make specialized economic analysis more accessible and relevant.
channel.itunes:author: Alexander Dentler
channel.itunes:summary: A daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy and macroeconomic developments. item.title: February 09, 2026 - María López & Alexander Dentler
item.description: Daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy for February 09, 2026. Host: María López. Analyst: Alexander Dentler. Topics covered: news roundup, economic data updates, and central bank calendar. Covers 2 news items and 3 data topics.
